title: Cash in via Linked Local Bank Partners
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

[How do I link my Unionbank account to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40229264624793-How-do-I-link-my-Unionbank-account-to-GCash)

[How do I link my BPI to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017898153-How-do-I-link-my-BPI-to-GCash)

[How do I cash in to GCash with my linked BPI account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/10282024155801-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-with-my-linked-BPI-account)
